quality_assessment: Documentation is accurate and comprehensive. Source references are correct. Missing MkDocs Material visual features for enhanced readability.

issues.description: Page lacks MkDocs Material visual features (admonitions, code annotations, tabs) that are used in other documentation pages
issues.current_content: Plain markdown without MkDocs Material extensions
issues.should_be: Use admonitions (!!!) for tips, notes, and warnings; consider code annotations for complex examples
issues.fix_suggestion: Add MkDocs Material admonitions for key concepts (e.g., precedence rules as !!! info, common mistakes as !!! warning)

issues.description: The Template Integration section mentions templates but doesn't link to the template-system.md page
issues.current_content: Template section has no links to related pages
issues.should_be: Include link to template-system.md for readers wanting more details
issues.fix_suggestion: Add 'See [Template System](template-system.md) for complete template documentation' at end of Template Integration section
issues.source_reference: docs/composition/index.md:141 shows linking pattern between composition pages

issues.description: Page lacks 'See Also' section linking to related pages (parameters, templates, environment variables)
issues.current_content: Page ends abruptly after Implementation Status section
issues.should_be: Include navigation links to related composition and environment documentation
issues.fix_suggestion: Add 'See Also' section with links to parameter-definitions.md, template-system.md, and environment documentation

issues.description: Precedence rules would benefit from a visual diagram or table format
issues.should_be: Consider adding a table or mermaid diagram showing precedence visually
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a comparison table like the one in best-practices.md showing aspects/scope/use-cases

positive_aspects: Accurate source code references with line numbers (composer.rs:217-257, composer_integration.rs:68-72)
Clear precedence documentation with correct behavior
Comprehensive examples showing with/without defaults scenarios
Implementation status section confirms feature completeness
Good coverage of all default value types (strings, numbers, booleans, arrays, objects)
Clear CLI override examples with multiple scenarios
Template integration example shows practical usage
improvement_suggestions: Add MkDocs Material admonitions for key concepts (tip for best practices, info for precedence rules)
Add cross-reference links to related pages (template-system.md, parameter-definitions.md)
Consider adding a 'Common Mistakes' or 'Gotchas' section with warnings about precedence confusion
Add code annotations (# (1)!, etc.) to complex YAML examples for line-by-line explanation
Add 'See Also' navigation section at bottom of page

verified_source_references.actual_content: apply_defaults function with complete implementation for env vars and parameter defaults
Parameter default application logic in apply_defaults
CLI parameter merge with workflow defaults, CLI takes precedence
